'''"Tears"''' refers to both a song composed by [[Amos Roddy]], and a [[music disc]] that plays the song when inserted in a [[jukebox]]. The music disc is obtained by killing [[ghast]]s by a player-deflected ghast fireball.

== Obtaining ==
=== Mob loot ===
The music disc "Tears" is dropped by [[ghast]]s when killed by a player-deflected fireball.

The entire track features [[ghast]] sounds remixed.

== Usage ==
Like all music discs, {{control|using}} the "Tears" music disc on a [[jukebox]] causes the jukebox to play the song.

If the [[player]] places a [[redstone comparator]] besides a jukebox playing "Tears", it will emit a [[Redstone mechanics|redstone signal]] of 10.
